article.title: Raytheon Receives Airborne Sonar Funds
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Integrated Defense Systems, Portsmouth, R.I., has been awarded a maximum $45,179,000 undefinitized contractual action (5026) against basic ordering agreement (SPRPA1-09-G-001Y) for the manufacture and delivery of airborne low frequency sonar helicopter dipping sonar systems. The contracting activity is the Defense Logistics Agency Aviation, Philadelphia, Pa.
